dis.desc: Providing programmes that support people with disabilities.

ecd.desc: Early childhood development programmes providing preschool services for 0-6 year old children.

health.desc: Providing primary health care programmes often in peoples homes including awareness and palliative care for HIV and TB patients

ovc.desc: Orphans and Vulnerable Children programmes providing child protection programmes for orphans, vulnerable children and their families.

senior.desc: Providing programmes to stimulate and support senior citizens.

victim.desc: Providing services and support include counselling and referrals to victims of domestic violence, rape and other crimes.

youth.desc: Providing social activities, programmes, support and mentorship for youth development.

3115--;--DC39.display: Dr Ruth Segomotsi Mompati District Municipality (DC39)

orgAdmin.desc: Administration privileges (including add, update and delete) for organisations and organisation surveys.

orgEditor.desc: Privileges to add or edit existing organizations and add new surveys

userAdmin.desc: Administration privileges for managing users (including add, update and delete).
